Html:
Hi All,

With help of other posts on this site (thanks all) I managed to extent the d3 library so it could be used in a MVVM environment. It works great, but I am still missing some functionality.
  • Most important for me is to be able to enable/disable line graphs with a checkbox in the legend.
  • And a small bug: line graphs are only showed when dataset is changed and not on creation.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/q9yl6fgim2nwsbc/MVVM%20D3.zip?dl=0a

Use my implementation if you like and please help me adding functionality for enable/disable line graphs.
Is there no one who can help me?
